headline: GTA Online
subtitle: SAN ANDREAS MERCENARIES
content:
Ever since the theft of Don Percival’s private files, the world has known that Merryweather was up to something. They’ve amassed enough defense contracts and illegal R&D, to put the criminal underworld under their boot. Until now. Join the revolution against the biggest private security firm the world has never known.

Plus, with smuggling opportunities on the rise, Los Santos and Blaine County are an open floor for some lucrative black-market business. San Andreas Mercenaries is out now.
